mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO weixin_report_article
id,
msgid,
title,
stat_date,
target_user,
int_page_read_user,
int_page_read_count,
ori_page_read_user,

share_user,

int_page_from_hist_msg_read_user,
int_page_from_hist_msg_read_count,
int_page_from_feed_read_user,
int_page_from_feed_read_count,
int_page_from_friends_read_user,
int_page_from_friends_read_count,
int_page_from_other_read_user,
int_page_from_other_read_count,

eed_share_from_other_cnt,

#{msgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{statDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

#{intPageReadCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{oriPageReadUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{oriPageReadCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{shareUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},

#{addToFavUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{addToFavCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
UPDATE weixin_report_article
msgid = #{msgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
stat_date = #{statDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
target_user = #{targetUser,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
int_page_read_user = #{intPageReadUser,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
int_page_read_count = #{intPageReadCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
ori_page_read_user = #{oriPageReadUser,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
ori_page_read_count = #{oriPageReadCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
share_user = #{shareUser,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
share_count = #{shareCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
add_to_fav_user = #{addToFavUser,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
add_to_fav_count = #{addToFavCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
int_page_from_session_read_user = #{intPageFromSessionReadUser,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
int_page_from_session_read_count = #{intPageFromSessionReadCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
int_page_from_hist_msg_read_user = #{intPageFromHistMsgReadUser,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
int_page_from_hist_msg_read_count = #{intPageFromHistMsgReadCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
int_page_from_feed_read_user = #{intPageFromFeedReadUser,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
int_page_from_feed_read_count = #{intPageFromFeedReadCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
int_page_from_friends_read_user = #{intPageFromFriendsReadUser,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
int_page_from_friends_read_count = #{intPageFromFriendsReadCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
int_page_from_other_read_user = #{intPageFromOtherReadUser,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
int_page_from_other_read_count = #{intPageFromOtherReadCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
feed_share_from_session_user = #{feedShareFromSessionUser,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
feed_share_from_session_cnt = #{feedShareFromSessionCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
feed_share_from_feed_user = #{feedShareFromFeedUser,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
feed_share_from_feed_cnt = #{feedShareFromFeedCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
feed_share_from_other_user = #{feedShareFromOtherUser,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
eed_share_from_other_cnt = #{eedShareFromOtherCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
weixin_user_id = #{weixinUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
create_By_UName = #{createByUname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
update_By_Uname = #{updateByUname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select date_format(stat_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) as stat_date, sum(int_page_read_user) as int_page_read_user , sum(int_page_read_count ) as int_page_read_count , sum(ori_page_read_user ) as ori_page_read_user , sum( ori_page_read_count ) as ori_page_read_count , sum(share_user ) as share_user, sum(share_count ) as share_count , sum( add_to_fav_user ) as add_to_fav_user , sum(add_to_fav_count ) as add_to_fav_count , sum(int_page_from_session_read_user ) as int_page_from_session_read_user , sum(int_page_from_session_read_count) as int_page_from_session_read_count , sum(int_page_from_hist_msg_read_user ) as int_page_from_hist_msg_read_user , sum(int_page_from_hist_msg_read_count) as int_page_from_hist_msg_read_count , sum( int_page_from_feed_read_user ) as int_page_from_feed_read_user , sum(int_page_from_feed_read_count) as int_page_from_feed_read_count , sum(int_page_from_friends_read_user) as int_page_from_friends_read_user , sum(int_page_from_friends_read_count ) as int_page_from_friends_read_count, sum(int_page_from_other_read_user) as int_page_from_other_read_user , sum(int_page_from_other_read_count) as int_page_from_other_read_count , sum(feed_share_from_session_user) as feed_share_from_session_user , sum(feed_share_from_session_cnt) as feed_share_from_session_cnt , sum(feed_share_from_feed_user) as feed_share_from_feed_user , sum( feed_share_from_feed_cnt) as feed_share_from_feed_cnt , sum(feed_share_from_other_user) as feed_share_from_other_user , sum( eed_share_from_other_cnt ) as eed_share_from_other_cnt
from weixin_report_article a left join weixin_userinfo b on a.weixin_user_id=b.id WHERE 1=1
and stat_date >= str_to_date(#{createDateBegin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d')
and stat_date <= str_to_date(#{createDateEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d')
and msgid = #{msgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and b.weixin_groups_id in (${ids})
and a.weixin_user_id in (${uids})
group by stat_date order by stat_date desc

select a.id , a.msgid , a.title , date_format( a.stat_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) as stat_date, a.target_user , a.int_page_read_user , a.int_page_read_count , a.ori_page_read_user , a.ori_page_read_count , a.share_user , a.share_count , a.add_to_fav_user , a.add_to_fav_count , a.int_page_from_session_read_user , a.int_page_from_session_read_count , a.int_page_from_hist_msg_read_user , a.int_page_from_hist_msg_read_count , a.int_page_from_feed_read_user , a.int_page_from_feed_read_count , a.int_page_from_friends_read_user , a.int_page_from_friends_read_count , a.int_page_from_other_read_user , a.int_page_from_other_read_count , a.feed_share_from_session_user , a.feed_share_from_session_cnt , a.feed_share_from_feed_user , a. feed_share_from_feed_cnt , a. feed_share_from_other_user , a.eed_share_from_other_cnt , b.nick_name, a.weixin_user_id, b.authorizerAppid
from weixin_report_article a left join weixin_userinfo b on a.weixin_user_id=b.id WHERE 1=1
and stat_date >= str_to_date(#{createDateBeginA,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d')
and stat_date <= str_to_date(#{createDateEndA,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d')
and b.weixin_groups_id = #{weixin_groups_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and a.msgid = #{msgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and b.weixin_groups_id in (${ids})
and a.weixin_user_id in (${uids})
order by stat_date desc

select sum(a.int_page_read_user) as int_page_read_user , sum(a.int_page_read_count) as int_page_read_count , sum(int_page_read_user) as int_page_read_user , sum(int_page_read_count ) as int_page_read_count , sum(ori_page_read_user ) as ori_page_read_user , sum( ori_page_read_count ) as ori_page_read_count , sum(share_user ) as share_user, sum(share_count ) as share_count , sum( add_to_fav_user ) as add_to_fav_user , sum(add_to_fav_count ) as add_to_fav_count , sum(int_page_from_session_read_user ) as int_page_from_session_read_user , sum(int_page_from_session_read_count) as int_page_from_session_read_count , sum(int_page_from_hist_msg_read_user ) as int_page_from_hist_msg_read_user , sum(int_page_from_hist_msg_read_count) as int_page_from_hist_msg_read_count , sum( int_page_from_feed_read_user ) as int_page_from_feed_read_user , sum(int_page_from_feed_read_count) as int_page_from_feed_read_count , sum(int_page_from_friends_read_user) as int_page_from_friends_read_user , sum(int_page_from_friends_read_count ) as int_page_from_friends_read_count, sum(int_page_from_other_read_user) as int_page_from_other_read_user , sum(int_page_from_other_read_count) as int_page_from_other_read_count , sum(feed_share_from_session_user) as feed_share_from_session_user , sum(feed_share_from_session_cnt) as feed_share_from_session_cnt , sum(feed_share_from_feed_user) as feed_share_from_feed_user , sum( feed_share_from_feed_cnt) as feed_share_from_feed_cnt , sum(feed_share_from_other_user) as feed_share_from_other_user , sum( eed_share_from_other_cnt ) as eed_share_from_other_cnt
from weixin_report_article a left join weixin_userinfo b
on a.weixin_user_id = b.id WHERE 1=1
and stat_date >= str_to_date(#{createDateBeginA,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d')
and stat_date <= str_to_date(#{createDateEndA,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d')
and msgid = #{msgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and b.weixin_groups_id in (${ids})
and a.weixin_user_id in (${uids})
order by stat_date desc
select TITLE, sum(a.int_page_read_count) as int_page_read_count from weixin_report_article a WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY TITLE ORDER BY int_page_read_count DESC LIMIT 20
select count(distinct(TITLE)) as titleCounts from weixin_report_article a WHERE 1=1
